Category: Software > Computer Software > Antivirus & Security Software
Product_Description: As companies become more mobile, employees are transporting files and critical data on USB Flash drives to do their jobs on the go. And it’s no different with personal files at home. While portable drives offer convenience, they also leave room for users to unknowingly load infected files, spreading viruses from one machine to another. According to a Verizon Data Breach Investigation report, 35% of users are vulnerable to USB-initiated attacks. ESET offers the Kingston DTVP 3.0 USB Flash drive with DriveSecurity to keep your data safe wherever you work, no matter which device you load information from. Easy-to-use and no installation required so you can plug in and start using immediately.

Product_Description: Feel confident about the time your children spend online with ESET's new Parental Control for Android.
